title: How much does a video weigh?
description: What color is a mirror? How much does a video weigh? Michael Stevens, creator of the popular educational YouTube channel Vsauce, spends his day asking quirky questions like these. In this talk he shows how asking the right -- seemingly silly -- questions can make incredibly effective lessons.
author: Michael Stevens
keywords: TED, talks, Internet, humor, science, technology, TED-Ed, physics, computers
